update() - Method in class Ammo
The update() continuously increments the direction and reduces the scale of the entity.
update() - Method in class Enemy
The update() increments a Sin wave for the enemy position as well looping through animation frames held in @Assets.enemyAnim[]
update() - Method in class Entity
 
update() - Method in class EntityManager
Update calls all the entity updates, checks for out of bounds entities and for collisions
update() - Method in class Food
 
update() - Method in class Map
 
update() - Method in class Player
The player's update method handles animation, movement, shooting and swooping using many of the boolean variables declared.
update() - Method in class PlayerShadow
The update method handles the animation
update() - Method in class Target
The update method just increments the position based on direction
update() - Method in class GUI
Within GUI.update() the score and stamina bar are constantly being updated.
update() - Method in class GameoverScreen
 
update() - Method in class GameScreen
The update method checks for a pause state, if not paused it will call all the update methods for map, entities and GUI
update() - Method in class MenuScreen
 
update() - Method in class Screen
 
update() - Method in class UpgradeScreen
 
update(float) - Method in class CameraHelper
 
updateSkillPoints() - Method in class UpgradeScreen
Updates skill points upon user selecting to upgrade a stat
